title: COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 902/95 of 24 April 1995 repealing certain Regulations classifying goods in the nomenclature of the Common Customs Tariff which was in force on 31 December 1987
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 902/95 of 24 April 1995 repealing  certain Regulations classifying goods in the nomenclature of the Common Customs Tariff which was in  force on 31 December 1987
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The Regulations listed in the Annex are hereby repealed.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the day of its publication in the Official  Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all  Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 24 April 1995.
For the Commission Mario MONTI Member of the Commission
ANNEX
1.  Commission Regulation (EEC) No 131/84  (1) 2.  Commission Regulation (EEC) No 270/70  (2) 3.  Commission Regulation (EEC) No 2392/79  (3) 4.  Commission Regulation (EEC) No 111/84  (4) 5.  Commission Regulation (EEC) No 1481/83  (5) 6.  Commission Regulation (EEC) No 1495/83  (6) 7.  Commission Regulation (EEC) No 3224/84  (7) 8.  Commission Regulation (EEC) No 488/78  (8) 9.  Commission Regulation (EEC) No 3401/82  (9)
